welcome_txt:
Welcome to 
ELITE Beach Resort & Hotel 
 Ain-Sokhna
about_txt_2: Located in kilo 24, Ain-sokhna - suez road
about_txt_3: The resort belongs to the egyptian armed forces
chalet_capacity_txt: It accommodates up to five adults and two children under the age of eight
double_room_capacity_txt: It accommodates up to two adults and two children under the age of eight
triple_room_capacity_txt: It accommodates up to three adults and two children under the age of eight
studio_capacity_txt: It accommodates up to two adults and two children under the age of eight
sup_market_subtitle: Delivery service available from 9 am to 11 pm
